text: Ivan Hamaliy (; 20 October 1956) is a former professional Soviet football midfielder and coach. ==References == ==External links== * * * Kuzmiak, L. Ivan Hamaliy: "After defeat to "Chornomorets" in the Cup semifinals, I cried" (Іван ГАМАЛІЙ: «Після поразки «Чорноморцю» в півфіналі Кубка я плакав»). Ukrayinskyi futbol. title: Ivan Hamaliy
